metadata.title: CVE-2022-46391 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
AWStats 7.x through 7.8 allows XSS in the hostinfo plugin due to printing aresponse from Net::XWhois without proper checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46391` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.8-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awstats package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.8-3').
